snippet.title: Mayhem Heroes - Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
This video shows real gameplay footage with some of the main mechanics of Mayhem Heroes.
Did you like the game? Get it on Steam via the link below:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2272430/Mayhem_Heroes/
